duties_responsibilities.duty: Recovering all store areas daily to ensure they're clean and well stocked.
Performing total store recovery, refills, culling, and replenishing of product across multiple departments in the store as needed.
Assisting with loading, unloading, and moving heavy, bulky products to support in-stock conditions when needed.
Checking shipments for out-of-date and damaged product to ensure freshness and quality.
Reporting all out of date and damaged product issues to the Manager.
Assisting with stocking; refills merchandise as needed.
Collecting carts from the parking lot.
Organizing, cleaning, emptying bins, and preparing sales floor.
Eliminating cardboard and trash on shelves and merchandising fixtures.
Cleans shelves and all merchandising fixtures; keeps sales floor area clean and safe.
Adheres to all SOPs for safety and sanitation.
Minimizes shrink through careful handling of product.
Complies with all federal, state, and Company regulations and standards for product freshness, food safety, and sanitation.
Maintaining a clean and safe store environment for the customer shopping experience.
Provides customer service by answering product-related questions and assisting Customers in a friendly manner.
Scans Customer items and completes transaction in fast and friendly manner, as needed.
